scripts.name: Torn Church Prayer Streak Tracker (Web version only)
scripts.description: Streak expiry in H:MM:SS (24h since last prayer, with ±30s grace), 24h count, consecutive days; pulse last 10m, red <1h; theme-aware; Refresh now; auto-refresh 5m & on visiting/leaving /church.php; history (last 10) with absolute dates; backfills up to 15 days; delta fetch; cached last prayer; gentle backoff; shows Expires/Expired at.
